products.title: Apple iPhone 13
products.description: 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, 128GB/256GB/512GB storage, Dual-camera system with 12MP Ultra Wide and Wide cameras, iOS 15

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S21
products.description: 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Exynos 2100 processor, 128GB/256GB storage, Triple-camera system with 64MP Telephoto, 12MP Wide, and 12MP Ultra Wide cameras, Android 11

products.title: Sony PlayStation 5
products.description: AMD Zen 2-based CPU with 8 cores at 3.5GHz, AMD RDNA 2-based GPU with 36 CUs at 2.23GHz, 16GB GDDR6 RAM, 825GB SSD storage, 4K UHD Blu-ray drive, DualSense Wireless Controller

products.title: Dell XPS 13
products.description: 13.3-inch FHD display, 11th Generation Intel Core i7-1165G7 processor, Intel Iris Xe graphics, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD storage, Windows 10

products.title: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch
products.description: 16-inch Retina display, 9th-generation 8-core Intel Core i9 processor, AMD Radeon Pro 5500M graphics, 16GB RAM, 512GB/1TB SSD storage, macOS Big Sur

products.title: Microsoft Surface Pro 7
products.description: 12.3-inch PixelSense display, 10th Generation Intel Core i5 processor, Intel UHD Graphics, 8GB RAM, 128GB SSD storage, Windows 10

products.title: Sony Alpha a7 III
products.description: 24.2MP full-frame sensor, 4K video, 5-axis in-body image stabilization, 693-point AF system, 10fps continuous shooting, Wi-Fi, NFC, Bluetooth

products.title: LG CX OLED TV
products.description: 55-inch/65-inch/77-inch OLED display, 4K resolution, HDR10, Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos, NVIDIA G-SYNC, AMD FreeSync, webOS 5.0
